## Look at the data and finish the cleaning

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(leaflet)
```

```{r ecos file}
### Read the file
ecos_species <- read.csv("../data/ecos_animal_us_ca_clean.csv")
```

```{r}
### remove the column "status_code"
ecos_species <- select(ecos_species, -"status_code")
```

### Test map the polygons

```{r}
### Use only one row
test_akekee <- ecos_species %>% 
  filter(common_name == "Akekee")
```

```{r}
m <- leaflet()
```


```{r}
leaflet() %>% addTiles() %>% addPolygons(data=test_akekee)
```
